description: Najica and Lila are sent to the country of Gilda to capture Elith, a Humaritt working for the Gilda resistance. Their mission goes horribly wrong when Najica is discovered and captured! Now, to save her partner, Lila must think independently for the first time. Will she be able to contend with Elith, whose fanatical belief in her cause makes her a danger to everyone around her?

titles.title: A Brave Lion in the Desert Appears with the Goddess of the Destiny
Die Göttin des Schicksals begleitet den mutigen Tiger in die Wüste
Le vaillant lion du désert et la déesse
Yuusou Naru Sabaku no Shishi wa Megami to Tomo ni
勇壮なる砂漠の獅子は女神と共に
